main.name: Joe Hollier
main.description: This is my React portfolio where I not only show you some of the software projects I've create but also some things I am interested in.
main.bio: After several years of physically building anything from racecars to rocket engines, I became obsessed with building using software technologies â€“ I have the global pandemic lockdown to thank for this. I enjoyed building personal software projects so much that I expanded my career towards using those same technologies to adress deficiencies and automate out laborious tasks at my current job.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: I was part of a small group of students who founded an auto racing engineering club to compete on a global scale. We designed, built, tested, and raced open-wheeled, formula style race cars. Check the team's webiste out

onlineclasses.name: Python and Django Full Stack Web Developer Bootcamp
Python for Data Science and Machine Learning

work.title: Software Development Engineer
work.description: Scripted a post test data pipline using Python, Pandas, and NumPy to store reduced trending data. Developed a React front end for easily viewing and exporting this trended data. Connected the front end to the trending database using a Flask API.
work.description2: I've been a developer for Blue's family of liquid oxygen / liquid hydrogen rocket engines. This includes full life-cycle deisgn of structural hardware, overall engine and test article layouts, material property development, and configuration managment.

work.title: Mechanical Engineer
work.description: Provided mechanical development support for design updates the Patriot Missile Defense System.

work.title: Mechanical Engineer
work.description: Developed mechanical systems for the area denial Supervised Smart Munition DoD initiative.

projects.title: MathPrepPro

projects.title: COMING SOON! - Formula 1 Exploration
